root.specsKey: Nikon Coolpix S9200 Point & Shoot Camera (Black)
209 g (with Battery and SD Memory Card)
Warranty of the product is limited to only manufacturing defect on camera body.
2 years Nikon India Warranty and Free Transit Insurance.
Customer needs to carry the product to the nearby Authorized Service Center to get the product repaired or inspected.

Nikon Service Warranty (Local Warranty) does not apply to any of the followings:- Defects or malfunctions caused by damage resulting from improper care, misuse or abuse of this product or operation of this product contrary to the instructions contained in the owner's manual. Damage or defect caused by accident, sand, water or battery leakage. Damage caused during transportation or mail. Damaged caused by any modifications or servicing performed by person(s) other than NIKON AUTHORISED SERVICE FACILITY. Accessories including batteries, charger, AC adaptor and other consumables. Any electronic data loss due to malfunctioning or repair of this product. Any consequential or incidental damages resulting from any breach of warranty, express or implied, applicable to this product. Nikon India New Extended Service Warranty (Local Warranty) does not apply to any of the followings:- Accessories like batteries, charger, USB cable, AV cable, Adapters, strap, etc. are not covered under warranty. Damage caused due to accident, sand, water, dust, fungus, battery leakage, etc are not covered under warranty. Warranty on free gifts is as per the terms of their respective manufactures, and this warranty does not extend to such gifts. Warranty does not cover the replacement of Product. Warranty does not cover any special, consequential or incidental damages arising in way due to malfunction of the Product such as loss of photography, loss of data, use, profits, or costs and expenses, etc. less

Yes, 6.9 fps (Continuous H), 2 fps up to 6 Images (Continuous L)

pic quality very nice n video quality awesome,,, but there s an another factor which should be considered while buyi high priced battery.1. it can take oly 45 mins to discharge HD (1080p).. bt it takes more than 3 hours 2 fully charged..2.can take oly 200 snaps,,, conslu: if u r an taki photos very rarely its very super, u r average user u must have an laptop 2 charge it.. so before buyi tis jst think n decide folks

I like this camera very much.Picture Quality:Picture quality is awesome while shooting outside.But inside room with flash may give you blurred image.Its zoom is awesome, but you need to use tripod or fix it somewhere to get the good quality picture while zooming.Battery:Battery usage is average, i took around 400 picture for the whole day and still it stand.The camera look is good and its very compact, it will fit on your pocket even with the cover. I am using 8 GB class 10 memory so i get good speed for taking the next picture

Affordable price, good picture quality, light weight, easy to carry. good and style model. expandable memory can be used upto 32 giga byte. Battery is lithium one. having rechargable concept. so, no need to purchase extra items for battery only.

I like this camera due to only quite good of pic & video qualityBut main problem in this camera is battery prblmeven in case f full charge it can took hardly 150/160 picOr if u keep on video mode it will close with in 1/2 hour.

don't think too much about it just buy it... I purchased it with 16K but still m happy cos of coolpix. The real essence of natural colours u can capture n see in this camera only...n nikkon is one of the leading brand in cameras rather than sony, fusifilm, samsung n all.....

the camera quality is amazing infact the best i have ever seen in any camera.I suggest u to buy nikon cameras coz they are jst best at itAfter all they are the leaders man!!!and moreover the quality of videos are just fantastic and the battery backup is pretty fine.

First of all just wanted to Thank Flipkart for delivering this camera in just one day!! Hats off for this. The camera is too good it has got beautiful features, the zoom is incredible. The clarity of the pics are also amazing.Thanks once again Flipkart!
